ComicInfo.Summary:
The wildly acclaimed saga churns into a monstrous finish as Doc Horror, Eve, Gunwitch, and Polychrome discover the haunted underground city of a lost race of extinct creatures and the monsters who now inhabit it. While touring its cyclopean interior, secrets sunk beneath the depths for eons rear their ugly heads. Meanwhile, Starfish and the rest of the team continue battling the zombie army up on the surface. The deeper they get in their ghoulish ranks, the closer the Nocturnals get to the weird lighthouse at the center of the chaos. Starfish discovers the key to her origins, but how will it help her halt the rising wave of destruction that threatens them all?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/nocturnals-the-dark-forever-3/4000-171375/
